roleset_name: make organized, orderly arrangment, having a systematic, efficient (maybe unified) structure

roles.descr: organizer, entity with good organizational skills
roles.descr_trans: 组织者，具有良好组织能力的实体

roles.descr: thing organized, domain in which arg0 has good skills
roles.descr_trans: 事物组织有序，arg0 具有良好技能的领域

roleset_name_trans: 进行有组织的、有序的安排，具有系统的、高效的（也许是统一的）结构
